content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner mining drill has no fuel
- Stone furnace has no fuel

### Copper cable factory
No entities found related to copper cable factory

### Electricity generator at position(x=117.5, y=-30.5)
Consists of 
- Steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5) 
- Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0) 
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5)
- Pipe group (position x=107.5, y=-34.5) is empty
- Pipe group (position x=105.5, y=-32.5) has full output
- Steam engine is not connected
- Boiler has no fuel

### Transport belt system at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of 
- Transport belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5) 
- Transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5)
- Both transport belts are working

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities
- Ensure that burner entities have fuel before using them
- Burner mining drill and burner inserter have no fuel

### Errors when using stone furnaces
- Ensure that stone furnaces have ingredients before using them
- Stone furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0) has no ingredients

### Errors when using steam engines
- Ensure that steam engines are connected before using them
- Steam engine at position(x=117.5, y=-30.5) is not connected

### Errors when using offshore pumps
- No errors found related to offshore pumps

### Errors when using pipe groups
- Pipe group at position(x=107.5, y=-34.5) is empty
- Pipe group at position(x=105.5, y=-32.5) has full output

### Errors when using electricity groups
- Electricity group at position(x=114.5, y=-28.666666666666668) is not plugged into electric network

### Errors when using belt groups
- Belt group at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5) is empty

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions defined by the agent.
No important variables assigned by the agent.
